basicdetail.name: Vivek Kumar
basicdetail.shortIntroduction: Hi, I'm a tech enthusiast, always ready to dive into the next big challenge. I have a knack for turning complex problems into simple solutions and love making magic happen with code. When I'm not optimizing enterprise search applications, you can find me strategizing in chess or leveling up in video games. As a lifelong learner and a natural problem-solver, I thrive on new challenges and continuous improvement. Let's connect and explore the world of tech together!

pointers.description: As a quick highlight on my current with role of Senior analyst, I advanced to development side of application, from last four months involved in R&D of GenAI and integration with enterprise search application, understanding the core functionality of Large Language Model and its mechanism using Retrieval Augment and Generation technique and what features we can offer to end-users ensuring the organization’s data privacy and security. Though below are the daily activities I am involved in,
responsibilities: Research and Development of application for feature exploration and enhancement
Writing and building plug-ins using C# for application
Log analysis of components like Engine, Web-app, Indexer to identify, understand and troubleshoot application’s issues
Working on integration latest version of data source connectors like Yammer, Drupal, Web Crawler, Database, etc. with Enterprise Search
Ensuring the data validity and quality between search engine and data sources
API creation for third-party to access data, while ensuring authorization
Building search UI using SBAs

pointers.description: Based on user’s activity on Search Engine, need to present insights to business as per their requirement and that includes
responsibilities: Creating analytics board using SBAs
Data auditing and analysis using SQL
API creation and testing with Postman
Developing full-scale custom analytical dashboard (backend + frontend)

pointers.description: Handling support activities to ensure application up and running 24*7 including
responsibilities: Vulnerability mitigation (server and application)
Server maintenance (resolving disk space, CPU and memory high utilization issue)
Incident Resolution, Service Request and Change Request Delivery
Conduct and Manage yearly activities like application’s DR Drill
Actively supports on-call activities
Ensuring other activities like SSL certification installation and updates

pointers.description: Started with role of Analyst in Enterprise Search Application, a product by Sinequa, on which whole organization relies for interaction with company’s data, interesting project where I was involved mainly in below activities,
responsibilities: Understanding enterprise search engine, including its workflow, integrations, network, security scopes with SSO and scalability, user features
Few features involved like, search engine behaviors with different languages based on priority, search engine auto-correction logic and working, etc.
Periodically go-through product’s news letter to get up-to-date with latest features, and ready analysis report on its feasibility based on our user base and requirement
